name: Introduction to Engineering
description: This course is an introduction to the field of engineering, covering topics such as engineering design process, engineering ethics, and sustainability.

name: Basic Engineering Mathematics
description: This course covers basic engineering mathematics topics such as calculus, linear algebra, and differential equations.

name: Engineering Mechanics
description: This course covers topics in engineering mechanics such as forces, moments, and energy.

name: Introduction to Agricultural Engineering
description: This course introduces students to the field of agricultural engineering, covering topics such as soil science, irrigation, and farm machinery.

name: Soil Mechanics and Plant Nutrition
description: This course covers topics such as soil composition and physical properties, plant nutrition, and soil fertility.

name: Irrigation and Drainage
description: This course covers topics related to irrigation and drainage, such as hydrology, water management, and water conservation.

name: Farm Machinery and Structures
description: This course covers topics such as farm machinery, design of farm structures, and agricultural instrumentation.
